import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-post', templateUrl: './post.component.html', styleUrls: ['./post.component.css'] }) export class PostComponent { tweetMessage:string="" tweetMaxLenght:number = 240 tweetRemain: number = this.tweetMaxLenght sendTweet(){ alert("twitter Criado") } changeTweet(){ this.tweetRemain = 240 - this.tweetMessage.length } }
F

{{ tweetRemain }}
